price: Ní ọjọ́ tí Allāhu yóò kó àwọn Òjíṣẹ́ jọ, Ó sì máa sọ pé: “Kí ni èsì tí wọ́n fún yín?” Wọ́n á sọ pé: “Kò sí ìmọ̀ kan fún wa (nípa rẹ̀). Dájúdájú Ìwọ, Ìwọ ni Onímọ̀ nípa àwọn ìkọ̀kọ̀.”
arabic: ۞ يَوۡمَ يَجۡمَعُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أُجِبۡتُمۡۖ قَالُواْ لَا عِلۡمَ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma yajmaʿu al-lahu al-rusula fayaqūlu mādhā ujib'tum qālū lā ʿil'ma lanā innaka anta ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
